Our values

Spiced up Tours

Pilpili means pepper. In each of our tours, you will find an extra flavour, beyond the standard tourist experience. Whether you are a nature lover, keen about traditional music, or political situation, we will work with you to meet your interests.

Flexible and personal

Would you like to visit a place or have an experience which you didn’t find in one of our tours? Organise a business tour? Let us know and we will do our best to find the most satisfying personalised solutions for you!

Socially responsible

We want to make sure that both our clients and the local community benefit from the growth of the tourism in Georgia. We work with the local businesses, stay with local people and make sure to avoid the tourist traps during all our trips

Environmentally conscious

We believe that nature is Georgia’s biggest treasure and we do all we can to protect it. “Leave no trace” is an important part of our philosophy, especially in mountains. We ensure that our tours are organised with the highest respect to the natural environment.
